name: Neuron
description: ARC is a platform that powers AI agent integration in innovative gaming experiences. The tech stack combines data aggregation, model training, and model inspection capabilities across imitation learning and reinforcement learning. The ARC ecosystem is powered by the $NRN token. - ARC serves as the factory and R&D lab for AI agents in games - ARC RL enables data contribution and co-ownership of super-intelligent game agents for everyone - ARC B2B empowers studios to effortlessly create, train, and deploy human-like AI agents in games - ARC powers AI Arena, a revolutionary PvP training and fighting game
